EmailTemplate.description: An Email Template which contains link to the session to be approved by admin.
EmailTemplate.name: Session Approval Dubai Dreamin
EmailTemplate.subject: A New Session Submission Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Approver,
An Approval Request for the Session: {!Session__c.Session_Title__c} is pending.
Click to below take action:
{!ApprovalRequest.External_URL}
Best Regards,
Team Dubai Dreamin
